responses.how are you: Its all good. How can I assist you today?
responses.library: The library is open daily from 7 AM to 7 PM. Where you can get all the information and the books
responses.admission: Admissions are open now! You can apply through our online site i.e, www.tbc.com.
responses.scholarship available: Scholarship applications are due by the end of this month i.e. January.
responses.coffee: The college coffee shop is open from 6 AM to 8 PM.
responses.sports: The sports is available for students from 6 AM to 5 PM.
responses.hostel: Hostel accommodations are allocated during the admission process.
responses.events: Check the events calendar on our website for upcoming activities.
responses.fees: Fee structures are available on the university's official site.

random_responses: Ok! Feel free to ask any questions you may have.
OK! I'm here to help! Don't hesitate to ask if you need assistance.
